verses.verse: Sing <WH7891> to the Lord <WH3068> a new <WH2319> song; <WH7892> Sing <WH7891> to the Lord, <WH3068> all <WH3605> the earth. <WH776>
Sing <WH7891> to the Lord, <WH3068> bless <WH1288> His name; <WH8034> Proclaim <WH1319> good tidings <WH1319> of His salvation <WH3444> from day <WH3117> to day. <WH3117>
Tell <WH5608> of His glory <WH9202> among the nations, <WH1471> His wonderful <WH6381> deeds <WH6381> among all <WH3605> the peoples. <WH5971>
For great <WH1419> is the Lord, <WH3068> and greatly <WH3966> to be praised; <WH1984> He is to be feared <WH3372> above <WH5921> all <WH3605> gods. <WH430>
For all <WH3605> the gods <WH430> of the peoples <WH5971> are idols, <WH457> But the Lord <WH3068> made <WH6213> the heavens. <WH8064>
Splendor <WH1935> and majesty <WH1926> are before <WH6923> Him, Strength <WH5797> and beauty <WH8597> are in His sanctuary. <WH4720>
Ascribe <WH3051> to the Lord, <WH3068> O families <WH4940> of the peoples, <WH5971> Ascribe <WH3051> to the Lord <WH3068> glory <WH9202> and strength. <WH5797>
Ascribe <WH3051> to the Lord <WH3068> the glory <WH9202> of His name; <WH8034> Bring <WH5375> an offering, <WH4503> and come <WH935> into His courts. <WH2691>
Worship <WH7812> the Lord <WH3068> in holy <WH6944> attire; <WH1927> Tremble <WH9123> before <WH4480> <WH6440> Him, all <WH3605> the earth. <WH776>

Say <WH559> among the nations, <WH1471> "The Lord <WH3068> reigns; <WH4427> Indeed, <WH637> the world <WH8398> is firmly <WH3559> established, <WH3559> it will not be moved; <WH4131> He will judge <WH1777> the peoples <WH5971> with equity. <WH4339>"
Let the heavens <WH8064> be glad, <WH8055> and let the earth <WH776> rejoice; <WH1523> Let the sea <WH3220> roar, <WH7481> and all <WH4393> it contains; <WH4393>
Let the field <WH9583> exult, <WH5937> and all <WH3605> that is in it. Then <WH227> all <WH3605> the trees <WH6086> of the forest <WH9194> will sing <WH7442> for joy <WH7442>

Before <WH6440> the Lord, <WH3068> for He is coming; <WH935> For He is coming <WH935> to judge <WH8199> the earth. <WH776> He will judge <WH8199> the world <WH8398> in righteousness, <WH6664> And the peoples <WH5971> in His faithfulness. <WH530>
